question: (Alex walks in front of the Wall of Remembrance in Yad Vashem, Israel.)  Both the valiant uprising against the Nazis & the final deportation are depicted here in the Wall of Remembrance to this city's ghetto, which at one time held more than 100,000 people in just 1.3 square miles
